data.title: Bellwood Cemetery
data.text:
Bellwood

Located about 100 yards or so west of LA. Hwy 117 next to Bellwood Baptist Church. There were 255 inscriptions in May 1998. Marsha updated some of the "Living" to the date of death.

"Read" and submitted by J. T. and Auty Leach Platt.
